akn:content.akn:p: Except for emergency procurements, before entering into any contract in excess of $ 100,000, the District shall issue an environmental certification to demonstrate, to the maximum extent practicable, the purchase of an EPPS.
An environmental certification shall not be required for procurements that conform to an applicable Default Environmental Preference Standard.
The requirement shall be satisfied if a District solicitation included a requirement that a contractor provide an EPPS.
